VII.i.2.E.11.g
.
Example:  DIC Eligibility Continued
Situation
:
A surviving spouse is in receipt of DIC.
In July 2008, the surviving spouse reported to VA that they remarried on June 16, 2008, at the age of 62.
Result
:  Because the surviving spouse remarried upon attaining age 57, payment of DIC will continue.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Remarriage of a Surviving Spouse
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
